name: Celebrity Weddings Dash Bride And Groom Fashion Dress Up Free - Taylor Miley And Kristen Edition
name_original: Celebrity Weddings Dash Bride And Groom Fashion Dress Up Free - Taylor Miley And Kristen Edition
description:
****** Free Fantasy Wedding Dress Up Game! *********

******** Hours of mix-n’-matching delight ************

Spring is here and love is in the air!

Fantasizing of a fabulous wedding that will be the envy of your friends? It’s every girl’s dream.

If so, you’ll totally enjoy this fun dress-up game that is so addicting you won’t be able to put it down. With this game, you finally get the chance to create and re-create your own wedding scene to make it absolutely perfect for the big day!

Get ready for your own special wedding ceremony. Truly the bride is the most beautiful lady during this event but not without the help of a full make-over. With so many make-up colors and styles, you’ll definitely look stunning – guaranteed!

Now that you’re relaxed and pretty, it’s time to put on your bridal gown. Complete the ensemble with your choice of veil, gloves high-heeled shoes and sparking jewelry. Your guests are waiting and you won’t disappoint thanks to your fabulous selection of dresses and accessories.

No wedding is complete without an amazing outfit to bring it together. It’s your special day, after all.

Features:

* Tons of BEAUTIFUL dresses!!
* Endless variations and looks
* High quality animations!
* Fun for ALL ages!

Unlimited possibilities for your imagination and creativity!

Download FREE Today!
